name: Heat Death (Akronsus)
description:
This is a Ludum Dare game jam game made in collaboration with Floxy

In the year 6 trillion the last remnants of humanity have gathered in a ring station around a black hole. Stars are a long time gone and only referred to in stories and dissertations concerning the matters of history. In order to stay alive the humans of the future need energy, but with no star in sight they use their black hole to convert the small chunks of matter, that didn't got torn apart by the ever expanding space-time.

Remote controlled drones are used to push and pull high energy rocks into the black hole. Not many personnel with the needed know-how is left. Now you are pushed in front of the control panel. At least your foreman left his sticky notes at the console, but:

Can you handle the job?

- Use the w, a, s, d, e, q, and shift keys on your state of the art space-drone-input-device

- Use the space key to grab onto the rocks, so you don't lose them

- Collect the green energetic rocks to feed the black hole (other asteroids won't be enough!)

- DON'T overuse the booster! This isn't all fun and games. The existence of all of humanity is on the line.

In Short
A game about space, asteroids, your drone and a black hole
